name: Embervale
summary:
Welcome to Embervale, the ultimate fantasy role play game that you can play fully as an extension on Twitch! Join the adventure and immerse yourself in a world of magic and wonder where you can become the strongest player, team up with other players, and create the most powerful guild.

Embark on thrilling adventures alongside your favorite streamers and experience the thrill of victory and the agony of defeat!

Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to the world of role play games, Embervale is the perfect way to dive into the action and join a community of passionate players who share your love for gaming. So why wait? Join the adventure and start your journey to become the ultimate player in Embervale today!
